data.message: Needless to say we would like to be able to help your foundation for the youth. Myself and my daughter, Erika work for a Non Profit but our biggest project of eventually getting going was to help with the yough that cannot help themselves.so, please give me the info for myself to give for your foundation, especially in memory of my daughter, Erika whom passed away,  to help in her honor.

replies.message:
Look Marshall! My name is Kimberly Kimmel and what I have posted in the past is REAL!! I'm trying to figure out a little comfort and go strong and make Positive out of a Negative!! I am a KIMMEL and would appreciate a little acknowledgement of my daughters passing with helping of any non profit or organizations YOU MAY have going on! I want to help the preteens the teenagers that are lost due to their upbringings and let them be HEARD regardless of their personal beliefs, sexuality and religion! We TRULY are all ONE!!

🙏✌️️
KIMBERLY KIMMEL
